dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener writes in, 'Can't wait for JLo in Astana! How much will Kazakhstan actually make from this concert?'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener writes in, 'Can't wait for JLo in Astana! How much will Kazakhstan actually make from this concert?'

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's a great question. I was just looking at the details—tickets go on sale April 11th, exclusively on Freedom and Ticketon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's a great question. I was just looking at the details-tickets go on sale April eleventh, exclusively on Freedom and Ticketon.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tickets for Jennifer Lopez's upcoming concert in Astana will go on sale starting April 11, according to the producer of the Astana Concert company, Malik Khassenov. Tickets will be available exclusively through Freedom and Ticketon websites.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're really trying to prevent scalping with those international practices Malik Khassenov mentioned, like limiting purchases to four per person and distributing tickets just days before the show.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're really trying to prevent scalping with those international practices Malik Khassenov mentioned, like limiting purchases to four per person and distributing tickets just days before the show.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Khassenov said organizers plan to implement international practices to prevent scalping. Tickets will be distributed just a few days before the concert, and each customer will be limited to purchasing no more than four tickets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's smart. It took them over six months of negotiations to get her, which is wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's smart. It took them over six months of negotiations to get her, which is wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Explaining the choice of artist, Khassenov said negotiations with Lopez's team took over six months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? He said they studied touring schedules and logistics—like, if an artist can come here without huge extra costs, it's more likely to happen.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? He said they studied touring schedules and logistics-like, if an artist can come here without huge extra costs, it's more likely to happen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "We carefully studied the touring schedules of major stars. The fee and logistics were key factors " if an artist can travel to the region with minimal costs, our chances increase.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And she's Instagram following alone is 240 million... that's bigger than the entire population of Kazakhstan. Just insane reach.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And she's Instagram following alone is two hundred forty million... that's bigger than the entire population of Kazakhstan. Just insane reach.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She has 240 million followers on Instagram " that's more than the entire population of our country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's so cool that he grew up listening to her music, too. You can tell this is a lot more than just business for him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's so cool that he grew up listening to her music, too. You can tell this is a lot more than just business for him.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I grew up listening to her music.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. He saw her perform in Abu Dhabi and called it unforgettable, so Astana is getting that same 'Class A' show on August 1st.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. He saw her perform in Abu Dhabi and called it unforgettable, so Astana is getting that same 'Class A' show on August first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We saw her perform in Abu Dhabi, and it was an unforgettable experience. Astana will get the same level of 'Class A' show," he added. Recall that Jennifer Lopez will perform in Astana on August 1.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: At the Astana Arena, right? Coming straight from Abu Dhabi as part of her Up All Night tour.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At the Astana Arena, right? Coming straight from Abu Dhabi as part of her Up All Night tour.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She will arrive in the capital of Kazakhstan from Abu Dhabi as part of her world tour, Up All Night. JLo's concert will take place at the Astana Arena.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. I wonder though—how much revenue could this actually generate for the local economy? Hotels, restaurants, tourism...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. I wonder though-how much revenue could this actually generate for the local economy? Hotels, restaurants, tourism...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, plus ticket sales themselves. But I don't think they've released any numbers on expected earnings yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, plus ticket sales themselves. But I don't think they've released any numbers on expected earnings yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: How much will Kazakhstan earn from Jennifer Lopez's concert

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, it's huge for the country's profile. A global superstar choosing to perform there? That's major.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, it's huge for the country's profile. A global superstar choosing to perform there? That's major.
